ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The shaytans did not bring it down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The devils did not bring it down:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The satans did not bring down this (Clear Book),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The satans have not revealed the Quran;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And this Qur’an was not brought down by the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it is not the Shayatin (devils) who have brought it down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the Shaitans have not come down with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Not by the Satans has it been brought down;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The devils did not bring it down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It was not the devils who brought down the Quran:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the satans have not brought it down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It has not been brought down by the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No evil ones have brought down this (Revelation):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it is not the Shayatin (devils) who have brought it (this Quran) down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was not the satans who brought it down:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It was not the devils that revealed it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the devils have not brought the revelation down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:210] It, the Qur’ān, has not been brought down by the devils.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The devils) at the time of the Prophet (pbuh) (did not bring it down) did not bring the Qur'an down.
